item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Vibhas Goyal aka VibeCoder. Simple tech enthusiast, Programmer Currently working as Senior Member of Technical Staff at Oracle. Working on the Oracle Analytics team. I studied from B.Tech (2014 - 2018) in Engineering Science and Computer Science from IIT Hyderabad. Ideas Behind this Blog and its purpose I truly hope that you may get some practical information from this website that help you and that is my mission regarding this website.

item.title: Contact
Stay Strong
item.description: Be strong. Remove all weakness. Remember why you are doing this. Be self accountable. Be disciplined.
